Package org.jivesoftware.smack.proxy

Support for XMPP connections over Proxies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProxySocketConnection  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ProxyInfo
    Class which stores proxy information such as proxy type, host, port, authentication etc.
    Socks4ProxySocketConnection
    Socket factory for socks4 proxy.
    Socks5ProxySocketConnection
    Socket factory for Socks5 proxy.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProxyInfo.ProxyType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ProxyException
    An exception class to handle exceptions caused by proxy.

Package org.jivesoftware.smack.proxy Description

Support for XMPP connections over Proxies.
